name: Energy Failure
description:
This is a bullet hell game where you have to COLLECT the bullets.

Stay alive collecting the green bullets and avoid the red ones.  Survive as long as you can.

This Game was made for the GMTK jam 2018, the theme was "Genre, without mechanic"

Use WASD, arrow keys o the directional buttons on a Xbox controller.

Credits 

CleaverGames - Programing and design

Kichex- Art and design

Music

"Anime Fight Music Loop #1" by Sirkoto51 https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/sounds/414214/

BUGS:

you can't die,

when the game restart the life bar doesn't refill 

notes:

don't worry the developer has been punished appropriately for his mistakes
